Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and José Ramírez hit back-to-back homers in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland fans felt a weight lift off their shoulders
The Guardians needed a win to maintain their lead in the American League Central
Miscellaneous Highlights: Josh Naylor was 1-for-his-last-13 before his key RBI in the sixth inning
Others: Joey Cantillo tossed five scoreless innings for the Guardians
